title: Steve Kornacki: Why Democrats should worry about their win in New Jersey
description: Steve Kornacki, NBC News National Political Correspondent and the man at the big board, talks to Chuck about the revealing numbers from Tuesday's races in New Jersey and Virginia.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Steve Kornacki, NBC News National Political Correspondent and the man at the big board, talks to Chuck about the revealing numbers from Tuesday's races in New Jersey and Virginia.
itunes:title: Steve Kornacki: Why Democrats should worry about their win in New Jersey
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: Chuck and Steve talk about the 2021 races in New Jersey and Virginia ... and look ahead to what it all means for the 2022 midterms.
